text.section: Instead of a property tax credit, the governing body of a county may provide, by law, a grant to any eligible elderly or disabled renter.
The governing body of a county may establish any qualification for the grant, including an income limit.
The governing body of a county shall fund the grant from the appropriate county source.
This section may not be construed to deny the governing body of a county the power to alter, amend, or repeal any law adopted under this section.
